abstract: Detroit Red Wings hire Jeff Blashill as coach; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: The hiring of Blashill, the coach of a Detroit minor league affiliate, ended a search that began when Mike Babcock left for the Toronto Maple Leafs.

headline.main: Jeff Blashill Named Coach of Red Wings
headline.print_headline: Blashill Named Coach of Red Wings

snippet: The hiring of Blashill, the coach of a Detroit minor league affiliate, ended a search that began when Mike Babcock left for the Toronto Maple Leafs.
